name: The Prompting Company
long_description:
The problem:
People are no longer searching on Google. They’re ASKING AI. If your product doesn’t appear in AI answers, you’re dead.

How it works:
1. Find & analyze user questions: We find the exact questions your users ask and check how often your product is mentioned.
2. Create content: We tell you what to post, where to post, and do it for you.
3. Route to AI-optimized page: We redirect AI traffic to AI-optimized page

Offer: Get your free AI visibility report → promptingcompany.com
one_liner: We help products get mentioned in ChatGPT.
